verse.name: c1a
verse.lines:
O, behold the Man of sorrows!
O, behold Him in plain view!
Lo! He is the mighty conqu'ror

verse.name: c1b
verse.lines:
Since He rent the veil in two.
Lo! He is the mighty conqu'ror
Since He rent the veil in two.

verse.name: v1a
verse.lines:
Once our blessed Christ of beauty
Was veiled off from human view;

verse.name: v1b
verse.lines:
But thro' suff'ring, death, and sorrow
He has rent the veil in two.

verse.name: v2a
verse.lines:
Yes, He is with God, the Father,
Interceding there for you;

verse.name: v2b
verse.lines:
For He is the mighty conqu'ror
Since He rent the veil in two.

verse.name: v3a
verse.lines:
Holy angels bow before Him,
Men of earth give praises due;

verse.name: v3b
verse.lines:
For He is the well beloved,
Since He rent the veil in two.

verse.name: v4a
verse.lines:
Thro'out time and endless ages,
Heights and depths of love so true,

verse.name: v4b
verse.lines:
He alone can be the giver,
Since He rent the veil in two.
